long_description: The Rossignol BC 110 Positrack metal-edge backcountry skis are designed for off-trail exploring without the need for climbing skins. Moderate tip rocker ensures flotation and easy turn initiation. Full-length metal edges bite into steep or icy snow and an effective sidecut allows strong, confident turns on the descent. Positrack waxless bases provide maximum grip and glide in all snow conditions and require minimal upkeep; milled base finish optimizes glide. Built with a lightweight, low-density wood/ air core, the Rossignol BC 110 Positrack skis are durable and dependable touring skis for on- and off-trail use.
short_description: The Rossignol BC 110 Positrack metal-edge backcountry skis are designed for off-trail exploring without the need for climbing skins. Moderate tip rocker ensures flotation and easy turn initiation.
